::Composer::

      Composer found Zardus pretty darn scary-looking, someone you didn't
want to mess with.

       "Ah, it's a pleasure to finally meet you, Zardus.  Like Astral here
said, I'd like to join.  I promise to be eternally loyal to you and the
Alliance," Composer said, forgetting his true mission.
